TopicTitle: Moving the navball (and ship with it) by mouse

Articles.Content:
So I got this idea, when trying to change landing site on Pol.

Basically I couldn't manage it using keys, it's just hard for me to know in which direction I am moving.

I don't know if it would help in this situations, but it would be a nice addition. By clicking LMB and moving over the navball you could move the ship in specified direction.

An alternative to that would be the option to reset the camera, so you're facing the direction your command module is. I always screw the camera so much that steering the ship is impossible
